overview: The video consists of nine tracks (ten if you count "Anyway", which is played over the closing credits), included in the album The Breathtaking Blue each of which accompanies a short film by a different director.  The video for "Middle of the Riddle" won an Oscar for best short feature.  Dedicated to the memory of Bruce Chatwin 1940-1988.  Recorded and Mixed at Lunapark Studios, Berlin  Except Romeos mixed at Townhouse, London
title: Alphaville: The Breathtaking Blue Songlines
